SEARCH
Module LabAssignment
Package data

Class AccountCreationRepository

java.lang.Object
data.AccountCreationRepository
public class AccountCreationRepository extends Object
Repository class responsible for handling the data access for user account creation and management. This class provides methods to Create, Read, Update, and Delete (CRUD) user entities (Students, Company Representatives, and Staff) from the underlying storage.

    • save

      public User save(User user)
      Saves a new user to the repository.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • findById

      public User findById(String userId)
      Retrieves a user by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique identifier of the user.
      Returns:
      The User object if found; null otherwise.

    • getAllUsers

      public List<User> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves all users currently existing in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all User objects.

    • findPendingCompanyReps

      public List<CompanyRep> findPendingCompanyReps()
      Retrieves a list of Company Representatives who are pending approval. These are users who have registered but have not yet been authorized by Staff.
      Returns:
      A list of pending CompanyRep objects.

    • findAllStudents

      public List<Student> findAllStudents()
      Retrieves a list of all registered Students.
      Returns:
      A list of Student objects.

    • findAllStaff

      public List<CareerCenterStaff> findAllStaff()
      Retrieves a list of all Career Center Staff members.
      Returns:
      A list of CareerCenterStaff objects.

    • update

      public User update(User user)
      Updates the details of an existing user in the repository.
      Parameters:
      user - The user object containing updated information.
      Returns:
      The updated user object.

    • delete

      public boolean delete(String userId)
      Deletes a user from the repository.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique identifier of the user to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the user was found and deleted; false otherwise.

    • existsById

      public boolean existsById(String userId)
      Checks if a user exists in the repository with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique identifier to check.
      Returns:
      true if the user exists; false otherwise.
